ygData.subject: Smithing Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings all, Having recently taken up this hobby that is more expensive than crack and harder on your wrists than being a professional flyswatter, I have
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings all,

Having recently taken up this hobby that is more expensive than crack
and harder on your wrists than being a professional flyswatter, I have
several quesitons that hopefully some of you can answer:

1) What determines how hard a particular piece of armour is? Is price
of the mold a good indicator? Is there a table of this anywhere?

2) Where can banded molds be purchased for each size? I know you can
buy medium in Freeport, small in Kelethin and large somewhere like Grobb
or Oggok, but there surely must be more. Any help is appreciated,
particularly for large molds in a place non-evil characters can visit
and small molds on the continent of Antonica.

Thanks,
Jyzan
